title: The Drawbridge
content:
Hi everybody,

Does anyone knows the name of the fonts of The Drawbridge?

Thank you for your help.

Giovanni

 [‹ Bagozza font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704200049/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43721 "Go to previous forum topic") [Fonts like this? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704200049/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43724 "Go to next forum topic")
author: internaz

comments.content: I don’t even know what The Drawbridge is. How about posting an image?

However the link isn’t helpful cos the body copy is different I think, sorry.

I’ve got some at home, try and post one tomorrow.

G

It seems to be an [UK Magazine](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704200049/http:/www.thedrawbridge.org.uk/). The nameplate is some kind of [Walbaum](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704200049/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Walbaum). I couldn’t find a PDF or bigger sample of the content.

The headlines are [Greta Display](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704200049/http:/www.typotheque.com/fonts/greta_display/) (and the body text [Greta Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704200049/http:/www.typotheque.com/fonts/greta_text/), I guess). The sans looks like [Fago Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704200049/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_fago_normal_black/?sample_text=Ed%20Vulliamy&sample_size=48).
